rules.name: Account_is_Null_Account_ID_Populated
rules.label: Account is Null, Account ID Populated

Flow.description: Updated DnB Optimizer fields to DnB Connect
Flow.label: PPO2: Parent Account Check

fields.name: All_Values_Null_Error_Description
fields.fieldText:
ERROR: All Flow Variables are Null

This process has encountered an error. Please start again. If the error continues please submit a ticket to Sales Ops.

fields.name: Create_Record_Error_Description
fields.fieldText:
ERROR: Unable to Create Account

This process has encountered an error. Please ensure that the record includes all required fields. If this issue persists please reach out to Sales Systems.

fields.name: Create_Record_Error_Description_0
fields.fieldText:
ERROR: Unable to Update Record

Please ensure that you own this record, then re-attempt this process. If the error continues please submit a ticket to Sales Ops.

fields.name: Create_Record_Error_Description_0_0
fields.fieldText:
ERROR: Flow Account Finder

An APEX error has occurred. If the error continues please submit a ticket to Sales Ops.

fields.name: Instructions
fields.fieldText: You're creating a new parent account for {!Account.Name}. Please enter the required account information below.

fields.name: NewAccountName
fields.fieldText: Account Name

fields.name: NewAccountOrgSize
fields.fieldText: Org Size

fields.name: Industry
fields.fieldText: Industry

fields.name: NewAccountVehicles
fields.fieldText: Vehicle Count

fields.name: NewAccountPoweredAssets
fields.fieldText: Powered Asset Count

fields.name: NewAccountUnpoweredAssets
fields.fieldText: Unpowered Asset Count

fields.name: DUNS_Found_Verification_Desc
fields.fieldText:
We've found a DUNS Number for this account. Can you verify that the information below matches?


Account Name: {!Account.Name}

D&B Company Name: {!Get_DUNS_Record.DNBConnect__PrimName__c}

fields.name: Does_the_D_B_Company_Name_Appear_to_Match
fields.fieldText: Does the D&B Company Name Appear to Match?

fields.name: DUNS_Parent_Found_Description
fields.fieldText:
Let's check the {!Account.Name} account for any potential parent subsidiary relationships.


{!ParentAccountMatchInformation}


Here are potential matches in Salesforce, please select the right account. If there are no results, or the correct parent account doesn't appear please select the 'Parent Account Not Found' option below.


{!ParentAccountMatches}

fields.name: Account_Option_Select_From_Above
fields.fieldText: Please Select the Matching Parent Account

fields.name: Manual_Parent_Check_Step_1_Description
fields.fieldText:
Let's check the {!Account.Name} account for any potential parent subsidiary relationships.


Website: {!AccountWebsite}

Domain: {!Account.Domain_Name__c}


Pre-Populated Search Links

{!SearchLinks}


If you found a parent or subsidiary relationship add the information for the parent below, otherwise select that no Parent Account was found.

fields.name: Parent_Company_Name_Search
fields.fieldText: Parent Company Name

fields.name: Parent_Website_Search
fields.fieldText: Parent Website

fields.name: Parent_Phone_Number_Search
fields.fieldText: Parent Phone Number

fields.name: Data_Source_Type
fields.fieldText: Data Source Type

fields.name: DataSource
fields.fieldText: Data Source

fields.name: I_certify_that_I_was_not_able_to_identify_a_parent
fields.fieldText: I certify that I was not able to identify a parent - subsidiary relationship for this account.

fields.name: NoParentFound_Description_0_0
fields.fieldText: {!FinalMessage}

fields.name: NoParentFound_Description_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: You are updating the parent account for {!Account.Name} from {!Account.Parent.Name} to {!NewAccountName}.

fields.name: SureYouWantToUpdate
fields.fieldText: Are you sure you want to change the parent account?

fields.name: NoParentFound_Description_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: It appears that {!Account.Parent.Name} has already been identified as the parent of {!Account.Name}.

fields.name: ParentCheckAgain
fields.fieldText: Would you like to conduct the parent check anyway?

textTemplates.name: DB_Account_Match_Info
textTemplates.text:
Duns & Bradstreet Database Check


It appears that a parent company relationship has been found in the D&B Database. The parent information is shown below.


Business Name: {!Get_DUNS_Record.parent_PrimName__c}

DUNS Number: {!Get_DUNS_Record.parent_duns__c}

textTemplates.name: FM_AdditionalApprovalMessage
textTemplates.text: This change has been submitted to Sales Ops and is pending approval.

textTemplates.name: FM_NewParentCreated
textTemplates.text: You've successfully created the account {!NewParentAccount.Name} and marked it as the parent account for {!Account.Name}.

textTemplates.name: FM_NoParentFound
textTemplates.text: No parent account was found for {!Account.Name}. Thank you for completing the Parent-Subsidiary Check!

textTemplates.name: FM_ParentAlreadyFound
textTemplates.text: Thank you for confirming the parent account of {!Account.Name}.

textTemplates.name: FM_ParentChangeApprovalComplete
textTemplates.text: You've updated the parent account for {!Account.Name} from {!Account.Parent.Name} to {!NewAccountName}.

textTemplates.name: FM_ParentChangeDenied
textTemplates.text: You have declined changing the parent account for {!Account.Name} from {!Account.Parent.Name} to {!NewAccountName}.

textTemplates.name: FM_ParentFound
textTemplates.text: Thank you for identifying {!Parent_Account.Name} as the parent of {!Account.Name}!

textTemplates.name: FM_ParentFoundDNE
textTemplates.text:
Thank you for completing the Parent Subsidiary Check for {!Account.Name}!


The parent account information has been sent to Sales Ops for creation. Since the parent account does not currently exist in Salesforce you can continue working this account as usual.

textTemplates.name: MAN_Account_Match_Info
textTemplates.text:
Parent Account Search Results


Thanks for identifying the parent company! Here is the information you provided:


Company Name: {!Parent_Company_Name_Search}

Website: {!Parent_Website_Search}

Phone Number: {!Parent_Phone_Number_Search}

textTemplates.name: ParentAccountChangeTicket
textTemplates.text:
Hey Sales Ops, I would like to change the parent account listed on this account. 


Please verify that this is a valid change, then approve it in Salesforce:


{!ParentAccountMatchInformation}

-

Child Account

{!Account.Name}

https://samsara.my.salesforce.com/{!Account.Id}

Existing Parent: {!ExistingParentBoolean}

https://samsara.my.salesforce.com/{!Account.ParentId}


Click this link to accept the change (only works for Sales Ops):

{!FlowChangeApprovalLink}

textTemplates.name: ParentAccountTicket
SearchLinks
